name: ruralist
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
someone who lives in a rural area (= in the countryside), or approves of this way of life: Hardy's novels are much loved by ruralists. Some ruralists commented that they moved from the city to get away from crime.
More examplesFewer examplesYou shouldn't think that data about the cities is irrelevant to ruralists.As a ruralist, are you really safer than your urban cousins?
